title: 2 Easy Ways to Add the Flashlight to Your Lock Screen

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the cog icon. Make sure to update your Android to the latest version. This method will work on Samsung Galaxy, but other Android models will have similar options. Keep in mind that some models don't support this feature. If you can't add the flashlight to your lock screen, use Quick Settings. Drag your finger down from the top of your screen to open the menu. Tap the Flashlight or Torch icon to turn it on.

steps.title: Tap Lock screen.
steps.content: Tap Lock screen . You can usually find this below Home screen .

steps.title: Tap Lock screen.
steps.content: Tap Lock screen . This is the tile on the left side. The lock screen editor will open.

steps.title: Tap a shortcut to change.
steps.content: Tap a shortcut to change. You can tap the bottom-left or bottom-right shortcut icon to change the assigned shortcut. On Samsung Galaxy, you can only put two shortcuts on the lock screen at the same time. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Flashlight.
steps.content: Tap Flashlight . On some devices, this may look like Torch . The Flashlight/Torch icon will be added as a shortcut. If you have an Android that doesn't offer shortcuts, you'll be able to access the flashlight in the Quick Settings panel when you swipe down from the top of your screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . This is at the top-right corner. To use the Flashlight, tap the shortcut button on your lock screen. To turn it off, tap it again.

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. Make sure to update your device to the latest version. With newer devices, this feature should already be added to your Control Center. If you don't see it, use this method to add it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Control Center.
steps.content: Tap Control Center . You can find this below General .

steps.title: Scroll down and tap + next to "Flashlight".
steps.content: Scroll down and tap + next to "Flashlight". The Flashlight icon looks like a white flashlight with a blue background. It will be added to your Control Center . To use the flashlight, open the Control Center. Tap the flashlight icon to turn it on, and then tap it again to turn it off.
